actions.when: bt and bt.distance <= vars.frontline_engagement.target_distance and following()
actions.comment: Stop following and face the enemy if we're close to the mob.

actions.when: bt and bt.distance <= vars.frontline_engagement.target_distance and not facingEnemy()
actions.comment: Keep facing the enemy as we fight.

actions.when: bt and bt.distance > vars.frontline_engagement.target_distance and not following()
actions.comment: Maintain a minimum distance from the enemy.
